decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): Location Plan; 3068-DR-0100 (Existing and Proposed Block Plans); 3068-DR-3000-P02 (Existing Elevations); 3068-DR-3001-P01 (Existing Front Elevation); 3068-DR-3002-P01 (Existing North Elevation); 3068-DR-3100-P02 (Proposed Elevations); 3068-DR-3101-P01 (Proposed Front Elevation); 3068-DR-3102-P01 (Proposed North Elevation); 3068-DR-8100-P01 (Window Schedule 1 of 2); 3068-DR-8101-P01 (Window Schedule 2 of 2); 3068-DR-8101-P01 (Existing & Proposed Window Details); 3068-DR-8102-P01 (Existing and Proposed Casement Window Details); 3068-DR-8104-P01 (Existing & Proposed Door Details)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), and the Ealing Local Plan (Reg 19) (2024).
description: Replacement of existing single glazed windows and doors with double glazed timber replacements
